title: 2021 Week 13 Recap - Good Bad Teams and Bad Good Teams
itunes:title: 2021 Week 13 Recap - Good Bad Teams and Bad Good Teams
description:
A room filled with some heroes - Dan Hanzus, Marc Sessler and Gregg Rosenthal recap all of the week 13 games starting with the Baltimore Ravens and Pittsburgh steelers. A few other games came right down to the wire like San Francisco vs Seattle and Minnesota vs Detroit. Nick Shook joins the show to recap the Rams-Jags game and Minshew-mania in Philly. As always, the heroes close the show with the Sunday Night Recap between the Chiefs and Broncos.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
